data.name: optional_upload_evidence_of_equivalent_standards_title
data.value: Optional upload of evidence of equivalent standards

data.name: optional_upload_of_evidence_of_equivalent_standards
data.value: Optional upload of evidence of broadly equivalent standards

data.name: for_sites_inside_EU_OECD_its_optional_to_upload_evidence
data.value: As these sites are in the EU or OECD it is optional to upload evidence at the time of application.

data.name: if_chosen_not_to_upload_evidence_you_still_need_to_obtain_this_evidence
data.value: If you choose not to upload evidence you still need to obtain this evidence from the sites. The regulator may request the evidence.
